sentences.en: A series of largely formless images rushed across the screen.
sentences.cn: 一连串相当混乱的影像在屏幕上闪过。

sentences.en: All the well-meant, sincere advice is largely wasted on him.
sentences.cn: 他对所有善意、真挚的建议基本都无动于衷。

sentences.en: It had been a tiring day, largely because of all the tedious waiting.
sentences.cn: 那一天真累人，主要是因为等得无聊。

sentences.en: It is a part of Britain as yet largely unaccustomed to tourists.
sentences.cn: 英国的这一块地方还很不为游客所熟悉。

sentences.en: Northern Somalia was largely spared from the famine.
sentences.cn: 索马里北部的大部分地区逃过了这场饥荒。

sentences.en: The advantages of this deal largely outweigh the disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易的利远远大于弊。
这个地区的大部分荒无人烟。

sentences.en: The judgments expressed are largely what is called received opinion.
sentences.cn: 这些看法大部分都是所谓的大家普遍接受的观点。

sentences.en: The move today was largely symbolic.
sentences.cn: 今天的举动在很大程度上只是象征性的。

sentences.en: The problems of the poor are largely invisible.
sentences.cn: 穷人的问题大多不受重视。

sentences.en: The recession is largely blamed for the disappointing response to the appeal.
sentences.cn: 对此呼吁的反应令人失望，主要归咎于经济衰退。

sentences.en: The Sky News TV station is largely run by ex-BBC news staffers.
sentences.cn: 空中新闻电视台主要是由原英国广播公司的新闻工作人员运作的。

sentences.en: The state of Nevada is largely desert.
sentences.cn: 内华达州大部分是沙漠。

sentences.en: These crimes were committed largely by professional criminals who lived by crime.
sentences.cn: 这些罪案大都是由以犯罪为生的职业罪犯制造的。

sentences.en: They largely misread the mood of the electorate.
sentences.cn: 他们很大程度上误读了选民的意图。

sentences.en: Up to now the post of president has been largely ceremonial.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，总统一职在很大程度上只是礼仪性的。

sentences.en: Yoko had largely confined her activities to the world of big business.

trans.tran_cn: 大部分地，主要地，大规模地，丰富地
